TEXT.TITLE: PROVIDENCE ENERGY <PVY> FINALIZES ACQUISITION
TEXT.BODY: Providence Energy Corp said it completed the purchase of North Attleboro Gas co. Terms were not disclosed. North Attleboro serves 2,273 residential customers, 288 commercial customers, and 40 industrial customers. Reuter
